title: The first rule posted as you set foot upon Masonboro Island is that dogs must be leashed. Yet, very few obey the rule. The dogs disturb \non-dog\" people as well as wildlife. They are a safety and health issue. Why doesn\'t the Sheriff\'s Department enforce the rule before someone gets hurt. Aren\'t they setting themselves up for a law suit?"
